questionData.explanation_of_Question: 當主詞結構是 'Neither of + 複數名詞' 時，動詞通常應使用單數形式 'is'。

options.text: Neither of the books are interesting.
Neither of the books is interesting.
Neither of the book is interesting.
Neither of the books were interesting.

questionData.question: Select the sentence with the correct subject-verb agreement.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 'a new car' 指的是任何一輛新車，是不特定名詞，所以用不定冠詞 'a'。'the old one' 指的是他原本那台舊車，是特定名詞，所以用定冠詞 'the'。
questionData.question: Complete the sentence with the correct article(s): He wants to buy ___ new car because ___ old one is broken.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 副詞 'always' 表示頻率，通常應放在主要動詞 'go' 之前。

options.text: They always go to the park on Sundays.
They go always to the park on Sundays.
Always they go to the park on Sundays.
They go to the park always on Sundays.

questionData.question: Which sentence has the correct word order?
